QuestData.Title: The Seal's Power
QuestData.Description:
The Nightwell is so overloaded that they could not spare anything for this seal. Instead, they are borrowing power from the ley lines.
I have traced one of their power sources to Kel'balor. We should head there immediately so I can determine how best to disable this barrier.
Yes of course I said "we." Surely you do not expect me to go without my bodyguard, do you?
I shall meet you there!
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the ley line device at Kel'balor in the Crimson Thicket.
QuestData.RewardText: Valtrois told me everything. She is hard at work on a plan for bringing down that barrier.$B$BI am afraid all we can do for now is wait. Thank you for your help.

Objectives.Objective: Protect Valtrois while she investigates the ley line device
